ragas.name: Bhairav
ragas.description: The foundational raga for dawn, Bhairav evokes a profound sense of devotion, gravitas, and spiritual awakening. Its deep, contemplative character sets a serious yet serene tone for the day.
ragas.aroha: S r G M P d N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N d P M G r S
ragas.pakad: M d P, G M r S

ragas.name: Ahir Bhairav
ragas.description: A delightful blend of Bhairav and Kafi, Ahir Bhairav offers a lighter, more lyrical, and slightly romantic feel than pure Bhairav, while retaining the essence of dawn's tranquility and upliftment.
ragas.aroha: S r G M P D n S'
ragas.avroha: S' n D P M G r S
ragas.pakad: G M r S, D n S r

ragas.name: Ramkali
ragas.description: Closely related to Bhairav, Ramkali intensifies the devotional and contemplative aspects. It is often associated with deep introspection and a yearning for the divine.
ragas.aroha: S r G M P d N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N d P M G r S
ragas.pakad: d P M G r S, P d N S'

ragas.name: Lalit
ragas.description: A unique and profound dawn raga, Lalit evokes a sense of deep yearning, emotional intensity, and a beautiful, introspective melancholy. It's perfect for a philosophical start to the day.
ragas.aroha: N r G M' d N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N d M' G r S
ragas.pakad: d M' G r S, N r G M'

ragas.name: Bhatiyaar
ragas.description: A bright and invigorating raga for the early morning, Bhatiyaar is known for its uplifting and fresh character, ideal for shaking off slumber and embracing the new day.
ragas.aroha: r G P D S', r N D P G M r S
ragas.avroha: S' N D P M G r S
ragas.pakad: D P G M D r S

ragas.name: Todi
ragas.description: A deeply emotional and poignant morning raga, Todi is associated with feelings of devotion, longing, and tender melancholy. Its complex beauty evokes a profound internal experience.
ragas.aroha: S r g M' d N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N d M' g r S
ragas.pakad: d N S' r' N d M' g r S

ragas.name: Bilawal
ragas.description: The quintessential morning raga, Bilawal embodies cheerfulness, purity, and a celebratory spirit. It's bright and refreshing, setting a positive tone for the day.
ragas.aroha: S R G M P D N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N D P M G R S
ragas.pakad: G R S N D P, G M R S

ragas.name: Deshkar
ragas.description: Similar to Bhupali but often considered a morning counterpart, Deshkar is a bright, majestic, and pure raga that creates a feeling of calm grandeur and positivity.
ragas.aroha: S R G P D S'
ragas.avroha: S' D P G R S
ragas.pakad: G P D S', D P G R S

ragas.name: Bhupali (Bhoop)
ragas.description: A pentatonic raga, Bhupali is majestic and uplifting, often associated with courage and a positive, confident start to the day. Its simplicity lends itself to profound emotional expression.
ragas.aroha: S R G P D S'
ragas.avroha: S' D P G R S
ragas.pakad: S R G R S D. S R G

ragas.name: Kalingada
ragas.description: A bright and sprightly raga, Kalingada is known for its cheerful and invigorating character, ideal for a lively and optimistic start to the morning.
ragas.aroha: S r G M P d N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N d P M G r S
ragas.pakad: G M P d N S', G M r S

ragas.name: Jaunpuri
ragas.description: A serious and reflective raga, Jaunpuri creates an atmosphere conducive to deep thought and focused work. It's often associated with a sense of contemplative detachment.
ragas.aroha: S R M P d N S'
ragas.avroha: S' n d P M G r S
ragas.pakad: S n d P, M G r S

ragas.name: Asavari
ragas.description: A profound raga, Asavari evokes a mood of introspection, renunciation, and deep, sometimes melancholic, contemplation. It's suitable for focused, internal work.
ragas.aroha: S R M P d S'
ragas.avroha: S' n d P M g R S
ragas.pakad: R M P n d P, d M P g R S

ragas.name: Gunkali
ragas.description: A plaintive yet beautiful morning raga, Gunkali offers a serene and slightly introspective mood, perfect for quiet reflection and a gentle, refreshing start.
ragas.aroha: S r M P d S'
ragas.avroha: S' d P M r S
ragas.pakad: S r M P, d P M r S

ragas.name: Alhaiya Bilawal
ragas.description: An expansive and pure form of Bilawal, Alhaiya Bilawal maintains the cheerful and bright character, making it ideal for a refreshing and calmly energetic morning.
ragas.aroha: S G M P D N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N D P M G R S
ragas.pakad: G M R S, P D N S'

ragas.name: Komal Rishabh Asavari
ragas.description: A variation of Asavari, this raga deepens the contemplative and serious mood, ideal for quiet thought and profound introspection in the late morning.
ragas.aroha: S r M P d S'
ragas.avroha: S' n d P M g r S
ragas.pakad: S r M P, d P M g r S

ragas.name: Kafi
ragas.description: Highly versatile, a morning rendition of Kafi can be soothing and introspective, carrying a gentle, romantic, and somewhat melancholic feel, perfect for a calm reflection.
ragas.aroha: S R g M P D n S'
ragas.avroha: S' n D P M g R S
ragas.pakad: S R g M P, g R S n D.

ragas.name: Vrindavani Sarang
ragas.description: A beloved raga for the mid-day, Vrindavani Sarang evokes a feeling of peace, joy, and tranquility. Its lively yet soothing character is perfect for a relaxed afternoon.
ragas.aroha: S R M P N S'
ragas.avroha: S' n P M R S
ragas.pakad: N. S R M R S, M P N S'

ragas.name: Gaud Sarang
ragas.description: A bright and cheerful raga, Gaud Sarang offers an uplifting and refreshing feel, suitable for maintaining a positive outlook and light concentration in the mid-day.
ragas.aroha: S G R M G P M D P N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N D P M' P G R S
ragas.pakad: S G R M G, P R S

ragas.name: Shudh Sarang
ragas.description: A prominent raga from the Sarang family, Shudh Sarang is bright and uplifting, creating a mood of lightness and relaxation, perfect for a mid-day break.
ragas.aroha: S R M P N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N P M R S
ragas.pakad: N. S R M P, P M R S

ragas.name: Brindavani Sarang
ragas.description: As mentioned previously, this raga's peaceful and tranquil nature makes it a good fit for unwinding in the mid-day, evoking a sense of calm and gentle joy.
ragas.aroha: N. S R M P N S'
ragas.avroha: S' n P M R S N.
ragas.pakad: n. S R - M R P M R S

ragas.name: Multani
ragas.description: A profound and serious raga for the early afternoon, Multani evokes a mood of deep contemplation and yearning. It's often associated with a sense of introspection and slight pathos.
ragas.aroha: N. S g M' P N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N d P M' g R S
ragas.pakad: g M' P, N d P, M' g R S

ragas.name: Madhuvanti
ragas.description: A beautiful and poignant afternoon raga, Madhuvanti is known for its sweet yet serious nature, evoking a contemplative and sometimes melancholic mood, suitable for thoughtful reflection.
ragas.aroha: N. S G M' P N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N D P M' G S
ragas.pakad: N. S G M', P N D P M' G S

ragas.name: Poorvi
ragas.description: A serious and dignified afternoon raga, Poorvi often carries a touch of melancholy and deep contemplation, ideal for profound reflective moments as the day progresses.
ragas.aroha: S r G M' d N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N d M' G r S
ragas.pakad: M' d N S', M' G r S

ragas.name: Puriya Dhanashree
ragas.description: A highly expressive and beautiful raga for the late afternoon, Puriya Dhanashree evokes a mood of intense devotion, romance, and poignant longing, perfect for deep, heartfelt reflection.
ragas.aroha: N. r G M' N D P, M' G M' r S
ragas.avroha: S' N D P M' G M' r S N.
ragas.pakad: M' G r S N., M' N D P

ragas.name: Shree
ragas.description: A dignified and serious raga, Shree is often associated with a settled and calm mind, providing a sense of solemn peace as the day moves towards evening.
ragas.aroha: S r M' P N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N d P M' G r S
ragas.pakad: M' P N S', N d P M' G r S

ragas.name: Marwa
ragas.description: A profound and introspective raga for sunset, Marwa evokes a deep sense of calm, sometimes tinged with solitude or longing. It's ideal for a serene transition into evening.
ragas.aroha: N. r G M' D N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N D M' G r S N.
ragas.pakad: G M' D N S', r G M' D M' G r S

ragas.name: Puriya
ragas.description: Similar to Marwa, Puriya is an intense and contemplative sunset raga, known for its deep, almost mystical quality, perfect for winding down with profound thoughts.
ragas.aroha: N. r G M' d N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N d M' G r S N.
ragas.pakad: r G M', d M' G r S N.

ragas.name: Sohini
ragas.description: A bright and majestic raga for sunset, Sohini creates a grand yet reflective mood, suitable for an elevated sense of serenity as the day closes.
ragas.aroha: S G M' D N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N D M' G S
ragas.pakad: G M' D N S', M' G S

ragas.name: Yaman
ragas.description: The iconic evening raga, Yaman signifies the transition to dusk. It's full of romance, peace, and beauty, evoking a mood of gentle anticipation and warmth.
ragas.aroha: N. R G M' D N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N D P M' G R S N.
ragas.pakad: N. R G M' D N S', P M' G R S

ragas.name: Yaman
ragas.description: The quintessential evening raga, Yaman is full of romance, peace, and beauty. Its majestic yet soothing character makes it perfect for the evening's unfolding.
ragas.aroha: N. R G M' D N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N D P M' G R S N.
ragas.pakad: N. R G M' D N S', P M' G R S

ragas.name: Bhimpalasi
ragas.description: A popular and sweet raga for the early evening, Bhimpalasi evokes a mood of longing, devotion, and gentle romance. It's deeply melodic and calming.
ragas.aroha: N. S g M P n S'
ragas.avroha: S' n P M g R S
ragas.pakad: g M P n S', P M g R S

ragas.name: Poorvi Dhanashree
ragas.description: A beautiful and poignant evening raga, Poorvi Dhanashree is rich in emotion, perfect for a romantic and deeply felt atmosphere as the night sets in.
ragas.aroha: N. r G M' N D P, M' G M' r S
ragas.avroha: S' N D P M' G M' r S N.
ragas.pakad: M' G r S N., M' N D P

ragas.name: Kedar
ragas.description: A majestic and devotional raga, Kedar creates a grand and respectful atmosphere, ideal for an evening of contemplative prayer or solemn reflection.
ragas.aroha: S M G P M N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N D P M' P D P M G R S
ragas.pakad: S M G P M, M N S'

ragas.name: Khamaj
ragas.description: A light and romantic raga, Khamaj is versatile and pleasant, often used for thumris and light classical forms. It evokes a relaxed, slightly playful devotional mood.
ragas.aroha: S G M P D N S'
ragas.avroha: S' n D P M G R S
ragas.pakad: G M P D n D P, M G R S

ragas.name: Bageshree
ragas.description: A very popular and beautiful raga, Bageshree is evocative of romance, longing, and joy. It's often used for compositions expressing love and celebration in the late evening.
ragas.aroha: N. D. S g M D n S'
ragas.avroha: S' n D M g R S
ragas.pakad: D. n. S g M, M D n D M g R S

ragas.name: Bihag
ragas.description: A majestic and celebratory raga, Bihag creates a grand and festive atmosphere. It's bright and uplifting, perfect for joyful gatherings and a celebratory mood.
ragas.aroha: N. S G M P N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N D P M' G R S
ragas.pakad: N. S G M P, G M G R S

ragas.name: Desh
ragas.description: A patriotic and romantic raga, Desh is full of emotion and cheer. Its lively and melodic character is perfect for a festive and vibrant late evening.
ragas.aroha: S R M P N S'
ragas.avroha: S' n D P M G R S
ragas.pakad: R M P N S', M P G R S

ragas.name: Hamsadhwani
ragas.description: A cheerful and uplifting raga, even in the evening, Hamsadhwani's bright and lively character is excellent for a light and positive mood while winding down.
ragas.aroha: S R G P N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N P G R S
ragas.pakad: S R G P, G N P G R S
ragas.samvadi: D (Shuddha Dhaivat) - *Note: Dha is technically absent but its shadow implies this relationship*
ragas.note_on_samvadi: While Dha is generally omitted, in practice, the relation between R and P (or a subtle hint of Dha) serves as Samvadi.

ragas.name: Tilak Kamod
ragas.description: A beautiful and melodious raga, Tilak Kamod is known for its playful and romantic character, providing a soothing and pleasant experience as the night settles.
ragas.aroha: S R G P S', R P S N.
ragas.avroha: S' P M G S R N. S
ragas.pakad: R S N. S P, M G R S

ragas.name: Darbari Kanhra
ragas.description: A profoundly serious, majestic, and introspective raga, Darbari Kanhra is perfect for deep late-night contemplation. Its gravitas evokes a sense of solemn peace.
ragas.aroha: N. S R g M P d n S'
ragas.avroha: S' d n P M P g R S
ragas.pakad: g M P, d n P, M P g R S

ragas.name: Malkauns
ragas.description: A powerful and deeply meditative pentatonic raga, Malkauns evokes a sense of solemnity, peace, and profound introspection. It's ideal for deep night reflection.
ragas.aroha: N. S g M d N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N d M g S
ragas.pakad: g M d N S', N d M g S

ragas.name: Shahana Kanhra
ragas.description: A variation of Darbari, Shahana Kanhra is slightly lighter but maintains the serious and introspective mood, suitable for deep relaxation and internal thought in the late night.
ragas.aroha: N. S R g M P n S'
ragas.avroha: S' n d P M g R S
ragas.pakad: P n S' R', g M P g R S

ragas.name: Bhairavi (light rendition)
ragas.description: While traditionally a morning raga, a soft and light rendition of Bhairavi in the late night can be incredibly soothing and calming, often used as a concluding piece to prepare for sleep.
ragas.aroha: S r g M P d n S'
ragas.avroha: S' n d P M g r S
ragas.pakad: g M P d n, d P M g r S

ragas.name: Sindhura
ragas.description: A light and pleasant raga, Sindhura offers a gentle and soothing melody, perfect for winding down and drifting off to sleep with a relaxed mind.
ragas.aroha: S R M P D n S'
ragas.avroha: S' n D P M R S
ragas.pakad: R M P D n S', R S n D P

ragas.name: Adana
ragas.description: A serious and grand raga often performed in the deep night, Adana is suitable for profound contemplation and a sense of solemn quietude.
ragas.aroha: S R M P n S'
ragas.avroha: S' D n P G M R S
ragas.pakad: S M P n S', D n P M R S

ragas.name: Chandrakauns
ragas.description: A beautiful and rare raga for the deep night, Chandrakauns evokes a serene and mystical quality, perfect for profound meditation and a sense of deep inner peace.
ragas.aroha: N. S g M D N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N D M g S N.
ragas.pakad: N. S g M D N, D M g S

ragas.name: Bageshree (slow rendition)
ragas.description: A slow and extended rendition of Bageshree can provide a deeply soothing and introspective mood in the deep night, ideal for peaceful reflection before sleep.
ragas.aroha: N. D. S g M D n S'
ragas.avroha: S' n D M g R S
ragas.pakad: D. n. S g M, M D n D M g R S
